title: Swagger Editor
content:
Oh goodness, a Swagger Editor
[http://editor.swagger.io/#/](http://editor.swagger.io/#/)


More information on example objects in the response:
* [https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/blob/master/versions/2.0.md#response-object](https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/blob/master/versions/2.0.md#response-object)
* [https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/blob/master/versions/2.0.md#exampleObject](https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/blob/master/versions/2.0.md#exampleObject)
